body_html:
You can use nvidia-docker or the wrapper script provided by Tensorflow (I haven't tried). But you need a solution to make Docker work with GPUs.
If you have a problem when installing nvidia-docker, can you open an issue? Thanks!
body_text:
You can use nvidia-docker or the wrapper script provided by Tensorflow (I haven't tried). But you need a solution to make Docker work with GPUs.
If you have a problem when installing nvidia-docker, can you open an issue? Thanks!
body:
You can use `nvidia-docker` or the wrapper script provided by Tensorflow (I haven't tried). But you need a solution to make Docker work with GPUs.
If you have a problem when installing `nvidia-docker`, can you open an [issue](https://github.com/NVIDIA/nvidia-docker/issues)? Thanks!
